data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 20,603 believers in the county of West Nimar to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of West Nimar, Madhya Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 20,603 believers in West Nimar, Madhya Pradesh, India a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, teach your Word to the people of the the county of West Nimar, so that they can follow your ways all their life.
data.verse: Teach me, Lord, the way of your decrees, that I may follow it to the end.

data.prayer: Over 97.69 percent of the people of West Nimar are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!
Spirit, I pray that the Bhil Nihal people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.

Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in West Nimar with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.prayer: Jesus, protect the vulnerable in West Nimar, Madhya Pradesh, India from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

data.prayer: Father, let those from the 20,603 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

location.name: West Nimar
location.people_groups_list: Bhil Tadvi, Javeri, Alitkar Salankar, Bhil Barela, Koli Dhor
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Bhil Tadvi (465,000), Javeri (2,100), Alitkar Salankar (800), Bhil Barela (994,000), Koli Dhor (410,000)
